derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: from French opale or Latin opalus, probably based on Sanskrit upala 'precious stone' (having been first brought from India)

entry.def: An opal is a precious stone. Opals are colourless or white, but other colours are reflected in them.

means.word_mean: 1. a translucent mineral consisting of hydrated silica of variable color; some varieties are used as gemstones
